keyword: how many calories in a teaspoon of granulated sugar
title: How Many Calories in a Teaspoon of Granulated Sugar?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a teaspoon of granulated sugar, plus carbs, sugars, and nutrition details for easy tracking in your diet.
h1: How Many Calories in a Teaspoon of Granulated Sugar?
assumptions: Level teaspoon of white granulated sugar (≈4 g); no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, packing density, and measurement accuracy. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A teaspoon of granulated sugar contains about 16 calories, all from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a teaspoon of granulated sugar?

faqs.a: Yes, it's nearly 100% carbohydrates, with 4 g carbs and 4 g sugars per teaspoon.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in one teaspoon?
faqs.a: About 4 grams of sugar, equivalent to 16 calories.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have more calories than granulated?
faqs.a: Similar—around 16 kcal per teaspoon, but brown has trace molasses.

faqs.q: Can I use less sugar for fewer calories?
faqs.a: Yes, half a teaspoon would be about 8 kcal; consider low-calorie alternatives.
